activities: 12 Interactive provides a member based perks and discount program for it's clients and their employees/members. 12 Interactive's clients include employers and member based organizations of all sizes. 12 Interactive uses data (1) to provide a point of contact for communicating PerkSpot correspondence, including your personal password, technical issues that may arise and periodic reminders that you may request (on an opt-in basis) as a user; (2) to assign a name to your user id and password; (3) to verify your employment/membership with the organization using our services; (4) to provide the benefits/services associated with PerkSpot.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: user registration, personal information, user preferences, transactional data, online data
